physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Large midline facial ulcerated hemangioma on the forehead extending to the frontal scalp, normal ophthalmologic evaluation, electrocardiogram, and echocardiogram.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially treated with prednisolone which did not prevent further bleeding; after endovascular embolization at 5 months, rapid involution of the hemangioma was observed within 6 weeks.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Head circumference at the 50th percentile; weight greater than the 97th percentile; length at the 90th percentile; normal vision and hearing screens.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: No further episodes of hemorrhage from the facial hemangioma; developmental evaluation showed age-appropriate abilities.
